review.title: “Great place to work. Great learning environment.”
review.pros: Pros – For an environmental and civil engineering firm in the Southeast, George Benjamin Turnipseed Engineers or GBT, is a great place to work. They are a market leader in water treatment design engineering in Georgia and serve a diverse client base across the state.
review.cons: Cons – Smaller projects but work on lots of different projects at the same time.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Keep growth opportunities.
